forecast.day_comments: Snow. The snow could be heavy at times.  Steady temperature around 21. Wind chill values between 6 and 11. West southwest wind around 18 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 90%. Total daytime snow accumulation of 2 to 4 inches possible.
forecast.night_comments: Snow likely, mainly before 2am.  Mostly cloudy, with a low around 16. Wind chill values between 1 and 6. Breezy, with a west northwest wind 21 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 49 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 60%. Total nighttime snow accumulation of 3 to 5 inches possible.
